about_the_game:
🟢 Choose Your Slime: Select from 12 unique slime characters, each with their own special abilities and playstyles. Master the art of slime combat as you pick your fighter to suit your strategy.

🎮 Fast-Paced Multiplayer Action: Engage in real-time battles against players from around the world. Test your reflexes and outmaneuver your opponents in chaotic, fast-paced matches. Only the quickest and smartest slimes will prevail!

💥 Bullet Hell Madness: Dodge a barrage of colourful bullets while unleashing your own! Stay on your toes, anticipate your enemies' moves, and unleash devastating attacks to splat your foes.

Are you prepared for the slimiest challenge? Let the slime battles begin!

name: Slime Battles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-3350P 3.1ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX Nvidia 650 1GB
  • Additional Notes: This game could probably run on a potato but this is the weakest PC I could get my hands on

short_description: Dive into the colourful world of Slime Battles, a fast-paced multiplayer platform game that combines the intensity of bullet hell with the thrill of PvP deathmatches. Gather your friends and prepare for an adrenaline-fueled battle like no other! Fight until only one slime remains!
